name: Recommended Patches for Oracle Database 19.15 on Solaris SPARC (64-bit)
author: p4vwd7
description:
Recommended Patches for Oracle Database 19.15 on Solaris SPARC (64-bit)Год/Дата Выпуска: 2022
Версия: 19.15.0.0 Build 220419
Разработчик: Oracle Corporation
Сайт разработчика: www.oracle.com/databaseРазрядность: 64bit
Язык интерфейса: Мультиязычный (русский присутствует)
Таблэтка: не требуется
Системные требования:
Minimum RAM: At least 1 GB RAM for Oracle Database installations. 2 GB RAM recommended.
At least 8 GB RAM for Oracle Grid Infrastructure installations.
Solaris SPARC (64-bit)
Описание:

Recommended Patches for 19.15 DB Home
33988339: Performance Issue After Single Flash Disk Went Into Confinement
34013305: MERGE ON DATABASE RU 19.15.0.0.0 OF 29780459 33121934
32455516: Hitting ORA-600 [ktsl_adisp_gcur:kcbz_objdchk] or ORA-600 [KCBZIB_6] or ORA-600 [KTSL_ALLOCATE_DISP:KCBZ_OBJDCHK]
29780459: High Waits On "latch :ges resource hash list" After Upgrading to 18c or Above
33121934: Library cache lock / load lock / mutex x during connection storm due to update user$
29213893: DBMS_STATS Failing With Error Ora-1422 When Gathering Stats for User$ Table
30978304: ORA-20000 During Data Pump Import While Importing Statistics


Recommended Patches for 19.15 GI Home
33988339: Performance Issue After Single Flash Disk Went Into Confinement
